Every female he comes across will be secretly a brainwashed, sexy hypnotist or villainess who will milk his cock and hypnotize him silly until nothing else remains in his mind.*

*Gira is a super hero dedicated to stopping these villainesses at all costs, and knows he can overpower them as long as he doesn't become trapped in their thrall...*

1.content:
